400: Um, excuse me... you can't do that.
401: Woah, caught you! You need an account to continue.
403: You shouldn't be here. Check your rights!
404: Sorry, I haven't developed a page with a URL like that.
general: Something went wrong, please be patient while I fix it.
authenticate: You can log into your account here.
authorize: You can see info about your role here.
